year by concentration of how many fueling stations per fuel type

time series
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dygraphs)
library(lubridate)
altfuel <- read_csv("data/Alternative_Fueling_Stations.csv") 
class("open_date")
altfuel$open_date <- as.POSIXct(altfuel$open_date, 
format = "%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S") 
altfuel$open_date <- format(altfuel$open_date, format="%Y")

openyear_fueltype <- altfuel %>% 
  select("open_date", "fuel_type_code")



dygraph(altfuel) %>%
  dySeries("open_date", label = "Open Date") %>%
  dySeries("fuel_type_code", label = "Fuel Type") 
```
